chapter.title: Exception (CM)
chapter.para: This module provides you some exception which could be useful in order to give more information about errors encourented during the life of your program. All exception extends the same parent class, i.e. AbstractException, although there is a defined hierarchy - packaging - as you can see below. Keep in mind that, although JPL provide Logger, it is not used in this module to print messages of occurred exception, it will be your duty to perform it. The message of thrown exception can be retrieved via what() function. Some of these exception override it in order to take out a template message composed by different argumentd passed to constructors.
